title.narrative: Promoting Human Security Through Sustainable Resettlement In Zambia

description.narrative: The purpose of this project is promoting human security for thre former refugees living in resettlement areas focusing on health, community and political human security; facilitating the protection of people in a systematic, comprehensive and preventive wayinclusing the establishment of rule of law and good governance.The proposed interventions will facilitate empowering of former refugees and Zambians settling in to develop their resilience and their capacity to mitigate and respind to current and future development challengesThe possible partners are as follows;Japanese volunteers stationed at Department of Resettlement headquartersGovernment line MinistriesNGOs including AAR JapanPrivate sectorBeneficiaries - the 50,000 (former Angolans and Rwandese Refugees and Zambian Nationals)
